title: an idea for you overwolf contest devs.

comments.author: Jman.3412
comments.body:
hello all,

not sure if this is right place to post, but it looks good.

I have a great idea for a overwolf app. not sure if its possible to make.

something that works like http://gw2nodes.com/ and it auto places your ip of each map you zone into so you can mark the correct locations of valuable resources nodes for all to see in the correct ip of each map.

Iâ€™d settle for an app that allows me to copy and paste my current maps ip so I can use http://gw2nodes.com/ better.

not sure if any of these are possible , but it would be really nice.

thanks
